main event: An unidentified flying object was observed on June 3, 1961, described as a brief, bright pinwheel-shaped object moving towards the southern horizon.
interesting points: The object was visible for less than 10 seconds but was considered bright and not identified as air traffic., An elderly man also witnessed the object in the field., The sighting was not to the wind and the incident remains unexplained., The observer noted considerable activity related to the object., Radar contact confirmed nothing was sighted in the area.
witness description: an elderly man and an unspecified observer
